name: Reynolds Bradford
about: This is my first Mac and I’m not disappointed at all, I had the money for the newer ones but I really wanted the Touch Bar which is why I went with this one.

name: Autumn Ford
about: The best laptop I ever experienced!! Never go back to any    different laptops Unbelievably fast.

name: Woodward Weaver
about: The best laptop I’ve ever owned. I would recommend this to anyone. I can see this one lasting for 10 years or more.

name: Robin Russo
about: Super fast. I didn’t think the Mac would be this good but it is. This computer 8gb works like a 16gb. This was a great purchase

name: Nadia Keith
about: The Mac wins. I had bought the intel with 16 gigs and it was warm and you can hear the fans blowing. I exchanged for the M1 and wow!!!

name: Charmaine Whitehead
about: So far this is my first Mac Experience and it’s been great so far! The power of the M1 chip is unreal, I’ve even played borderlands 2 on it
